                    if ((value == defaultValue) || (value == "")) {
                        var event = e || window.event;

                        HandleEventPropagation(event);
                    }

                <h2>Kemira has successfully started up its new sodium chlorate production line in Joutseno, Finland</h2>
                <img src="/_layouts/Kemira.V3.UI/img/Kemira_press_120x120.jpg" alt="" />
                <div class="content"> 
                    <span class="date-heading">05/09/2017&nbsp;Press release</span>

                    <br />

        <div class="item">
            <a href="http://www.kemira.com/en/newsroom/whats-new/Pages/kemira-announces-price-increase-for-silicone-defoamer-in-the-americas.aspx">
                <h2>Kemira announces price increase for silicone defoamer in the Americas</h2>
                <img src="/SiteCollectionImages/newsroom/whats-new/news-kemira-thumbnail.jpg" alt="" />
                <div class="content"> 
                    <span class="date-heading">31/08/2017&nbsp;News</span>
                    Kemira will implement a price increase of 5% for all silicone emulsion defoamer products as well as an increase of up to 25% for silicone concentrate defoamer products sold for use in the Pulp and Paper market in the Americas.
                    <br /> 
                    <a class="more-link" href="http://www.kemira.com/en/newsroom/whats-new/Pages/kemira-announces-price-increase-for-silicone-defoamer-in-the-americas.aspx">More</a>
                </div>
            </a>
        </div>
    
        <div class="item">

                <h2>Kemira KemRevive chosen as a finalist in ICIS Innovation Awards</h2>

                <div class="content"> 
                    <span class="date-heading">17/08/2017&nbsp;News</span>
                    Kemira has been chosen as a finalist in ICIS’ Innovation Awards with its new KemRevive concept for recycling starch in packaging board making.
                    <br /> 
                    <a class="more-link" href="http://www.kemira.com/en/newsroom/whats-new/Pages/Kemira-KemRevive-chosen-as-a-finalist-in-ICIS-Innovation-Awards.aspx">More</a>
